reviewTitle: Great! As advertised. Works with thicker cases
reviewDescription: Great product. Been using it for months and it has no fallen or become weak. Looks nice and features are A+. Don’t have anything bad to say about it. I use this as a windshield mount not a vent mount. I believe it’s too heavy with my phone to use in a vent. I have a iPhone XR with generic ottorbox case. Easy to install, strong suction, easy to charge my phone while mounted. Not sure how it stands up to the heat yet as summer heat isn’t bad yet.

This is the second one of these I've purchased.  The first one worked great for a about 18 months....no problems.  The only reason that I bought a second one was because I had to have my windshield replaced. The company obviously had to remove the first holder.  The suction was so strong that it kind of messed up the suction cup when they removed it!! So happy that I was able to buy the same holder.  I believe that this one will hold up as well as the first one.  Would highly recommend.

I purchased this product and had an initial challenge, but the customer service and May were extremely responsive and helpful and immediately resolved my issue with no problem.  I greatly appreciated their attentive response and great service to the customer.  The product works great.

I’ve had this mount for over 3 years and never once had to replace the adhesive attachment or had any issues. I work from my vehicle and in both extreme cold and heat environments. Should I ever need a replacement, I will definitely go with this product again.

I've had this for 2 years now and it's still going strong. If it stops sticking, just wash it with soap and hot water and it goes right back to sticking. Even with 100°+ weather, it is still going strong. 10/10
Loved it till it broke less than 6 months. Never needed to mess with it but one day the place where the phone goes and holds it in position broke while phone was in it.

Adhesive not holding. First warm day and I’ve had to reattach several times. Silicone seems intact but is not bonding to the dash. Didn’t even hit 80, very disappointed.Past return period so bummed. Will have to search for alternatives.
I bought this hoping that I could set it an forget it. The adhesive did not stay longer than a few weeks. The design is great, but it is useless without it staying on my dashboard.

Cold weather, this is great; stays in place perfectly. But now that it's Spring and warmer weather is here, the adhesion expands, it no longer stays in place, and the suction doesn't back it up. The whole thing falls.

reviewTitle: Adhesion only lasted less than a month
reviewDescription: Adhesion lasted less than a month and now window return period closed. Worked well when it was mounted but big disappointment in the end. Used flat surface and cleaned it as instructed but didn’t help. Don’t waste your money
at first i really liked it, it held my phone well and all up until 1 month in it started to get loose and now that every time i do a turn it keeps moving but not slighty, by alot.
The car mount is fine.  The issue I had is that it said it would fit thicker phones.  It has the same depth as a normal phone holder.  So if you have a thicker phone, I would be cautious.
The auction cup is a POS. Cleaned off my dashboard and it stayed on maybe 5 minutes then it kept falling off due to the weight of cell phones. I'm stuck using the clip after I tossed the other half.
The actual part where you put your phone is awesome but the whole mount fell while i was driving almost causing an accident
The thing falls off over and over with hot summer day hear after just a couple of days of having. very disappointed as this was supposed to be the best on amazon.

i installed this last week on my dashboard using the suction cup.  It included a metal plate with adhesive in case the suction doesn't work, and it includes a clip for mounting onto your vent. I didn't need either of these because the adhesion on my dashboard is very solid.The material of the suction cup, while not adhesive, is extremely tacky so when pressed on the surface and locked using a small lever, the attachment to the dashboard is secure and stable. I don't notice any vibration while driving.The only qualm I have is that the clip that holds your phone is small, I would have personally (having large hands) liked to have had a bigger clips.  The other wish was that it would be deep enough so that I don't have to unclip my phone from its wallet holder. This would require the clip depth to be > 1.25" but this product is closer to 0.5".  (I have an iPhone XR wallet case from 12 South).  But I couldn't find any phone holder on the market that would meet that desire, so given that I think this holder is optimal
I have a Samsung galixy 21fe phone with a case. This gets big enough for my phone but barely. Any bigger of a phone probably wouldn't fit. But it works great for what I need it f9r!

I ordered this item to replace a similar product that the suction kept failing on. I needed extension and suction that would hold even when the car was parked in sunshine. I installed it in my car and used it for a couple weeks. It worked great. I then needed to transfer it to another vehicle for a weeklong trip that required a 9 hour drive each way. When I tried to remove from the windshield it was stuck fast and hard. I had to "manhandle" the release pull to get the unit to release. It stayed put in the rental vehicle windshield as well. Even in high humidity and heat. When I returned home and removed from the rental I was greeted with the same super tough stickiness and had to manhandle to remove again. Definitely worth the money and should this one break or fail for any reason, I will buy again.

reviewTitle: Works well and solidly built, may not be perfect for you
reviewDescription: The glass suction cup is adhesive in addition, and very sticky. It was quick to install and works well for what I need it for—with caveats.Unfortunately the padded material holds heat, so my phone gets very hot on the back when fit properly into the cradle; I have to lift it a bit in order to get some airflow. It's worse in the sun, but that's to be expected. The included window mount arm also has very large steps when rotating it, so it's hard to get it into a good position due to the sheer angle of my windshield. I ended up putting it on backwards from how they display it in the promotional images and instructions, and I am able to angle it better now. I am using the mount to use my smartphone as a dashcam so the reverse position of the cup also moves the giant hand turn screw out of the way a bit for better camera visibility.

reviewTitle: Lasted awhile, but eventually fell off and wouldn’t stick
reviewDescription: I bought this about a year ago and it worked great in my car! Easy to install for a not-so mechanically-inclined teenager. My phone was always secure and it made it super easy for me to have access while driving (for navigation or DJ purposes). HOWEVER, about a week ago it was extremely hot outside and the heat did a number on it. I noticed it sagging a bit as I was driving to work. As I drove, it continued to sag lower and then eventually just fell off. I tried sticking it back on, but once I put my phone inside it falls off again. Guess it’s time for a new one, perhaps a vent clip that won’t unstick in heat?

reviewTitle: My phone fits with a case cover on it.
reviewDescription: No complaints
The gear shaped plastic fastner that holds the phone mount to the arm snapped and is useless now but I loved the product could you send me some new fastners.

I wish this cell phone had is the ability to hold phones with a folding leather case. I still have to take my phone out of the case to use the holder.. Then it would be perfect. But it is still an amazing holer. It does firmly hold phones with a protective jacket. The best part of this holder is the flexibility. I recently used mine while going through some beautiful Colorado mountains. By mounting my phone backwards (lens facing the windshield) I got some amazing video and time lapse photos. And, the camera could be rotated to catch the scenes in portrait or landscape. Another convenience, I mounted the holder close to the center of the dash so with a little twist the phone can face the driver or passenger. My wife likes to glance at the map and appreciates that function.
Stable no shaky while driving, stick good to windshield (it's been about a month now...will see how long will last) Able to hold S23Ultra with thick case.
This product does exactly what I needed for! Would def recommend.
Bought this for my husband. He likes it, but sometimes his phone slips out.  Could hold a little better

This lil' guy has been doing so well! I wanted something I could stick to the area in front of my clock display (dashboard area but smooth plastic so I didn't have to use the sticky disc) because I live in LA and the heat always makes the ones on the windshield pop off because this city is a desert and everyone pretends like it's not because we're stealing water from the CO River to get by....but I digress. Phone holder 1, Desert heat 0.The piece that holds the actual phone is not terribly deep and I have a phone case with one of those moveable finger rings on it so it's a little thicker than usual. To remedy this, I tilted this part back a little so the phone kind of just rests on it in place. Absolutely not a major issue, but anyone using an Otterbox or something similar might experience the same thing. I love the "jointed" feature on this instead of a long bendy arm that you have to wrestle into place. Much more user-friendly.Be careful not to attach it where it brushes up against knobs in your car. I didn't notice right away, but the holder bouncing on my A/C knob has chipped a lot of the paint off of it. This is user error, nothing wrong with the product. If you keep hitting something, eventually something will change. It's very easy to adjust and was a quick fix once I caught on.Overall, very good product that gives you a lot of freedom when it comes to how you want to position the mount and where you want the phone to hang out. I'll be sticking to mounts like this in the future.

reviewTitle: Amazing customer service and Good Product
reviewDescription: I've ordered this phone mount twice before (once for myself and once as a gift) but when I ordered this time around, something went wrong with the mechanics on my first use. The side clamps to hold the phone in place got stuck when I released them and wouldn't tighten up to secure my phone. I reached out to customer service on Instagram as I got a card in the box saying it had a lifetime warranty, and they were kind enough to order and send me a replacement free of charge. It's genuinely a good product which is why I ordered it again and I'm glad their customer service reps were able to help me.

This thing is great! I like having the option to use the dash mount as well as the air vent mount. I used the dash mount originally because I liked the placement, but the air vent mount is actually very helpful in the summer, as my phone tends to overheat in the summer sun when it's on the dash - when it's attached to the air vent, it gets its own AC right on it! Honestly a game-changer.I've had this for a few years. One small piece on the back did crack (might have been my fault as I didn't understand how it was attached at first), but customer service was so helpful and responsive. Every now and then the suction comes undone, but this is only on the hottest summer days, and it always goes right back on, no problem. I have an iphone SE and a Honda Fit. It has also worked great for my partner's Pixel. Price is right, would definitely buy this or newer models again.

reviewTitle: Excellent customer service and high quality product
reviewDescription: I bought this car mount 2-3 year ago and using it all the time, great quality, highly recommend it for anyone I know. recently the nuts was cracked, contact their customer service support, they send me the replacements very quick. Highly highly recommended.

reviewTitle: Good grip on phone, easy set up
reviewDescription: got this since its "rally race durable" and i have to say they may be right about that, very easy to use and set up. Multiple way to set up, im using mine in the vent clip config and its been holding very well.

I bought this phone mount last year and it was great til my newphew got a hold of it and papered the sticky suction cup. I was upset to say the least and took the sticky suction cup of and was hoping to replace it. I tried others to no avail so I contacted VICSEED and they hooked me up, Cathy was my go to and she made sure to let me know when my replacement was shipping. They didn’t just replace the sticky suction cup they replaced the arm that is attached to the suction. Thank you VICSEED!! Worth every penny!! The first photo posted is the empty suction without the sticky.

reviewTitle: This holder keeps your phone secure
reviewDescription: I like that this holder can be mounted anywhere in your car. I have mind with a suction cup on the wind schield, very adjustable stable add ease of removal

reviewTitle: Better than any other car mount I’ve tried
reviewDescription: I was driving today and had to tighten the arm bolt, and realized how reliable it has been. I’ve tried several car mounts but they never last in the Texas heat and usually fall off after a few months. I decided to leave a review on this and see when I ordered it, I bought this 2 years ago. Except for retightening and adjusting the arm a couple times it’s never had any issues. The plastic is turning yellow, it’s going on it’s third Texas summer, and on a dash that’s not perfectly flat, and it hasn’t budged an inch. Unless I actually released the latch to reposition it.It is a little bulky, but I have it slightly behind and right next to my dash screen and haven’t had any visibility problems. I love the side clamps. I can quickly plop my phone in and squeeze them shut and it stays put. Then I press the side button, it pops open, I grab my phone and go. No awkward fiddling around to put it on or take it off.

My husband purchased one of these years ago for his car and it is amazing. I finally got tired of my cheap ones breaking and bought a vicseed one for my car. It is the best one I’ve had. It’s super adjustable and sturdy.
As an avid camper and off roader, this thing holds up!! I’ve broken and gone through at least 7 other brands and this one is still hanging on strong!
El mejor soporte que he podido conseguir.  Es seguro y
Needed a phone holder that could handle off road driving. This has worked out great. The holder has multiple options for placement.
Good quality, interested to see how it’ll hold up in the heat next summer. Easy to set up, proper size for iPhone 14 Pro Max, stable and vibration resistant.
Does not disappoint!
Great cellphone holder. Sturdy and easy to manage.

I haven't found anything negative about this product, historical I have bought those that could be fastened to the windshield.  This style is the first dash mounted one I am using, the fact that you can change from dash mount to vent clip is an added plus.
I've gotten 2. The first one I had for a long time then move to a new car and got another.
This phone holder is easy to install and durable. Love it.
Price is great and it's made good.

reviewTitle: Suction Cup failed after a few hours in the sun
reviewDescription: Brand new car, extremely clean windshield.  Suction Cup failed after a few hours driving in the sun.  The suction cup lever doesn't have much pull on the cup, so it doesn't really have much suction at all.  Everything else is fine, but it failed to do what I purchased it for.
The mount fell off in less than a year of purchase because the adhesive isn’t strong enough!! And keeps falling off no matter how many times I hit it in.

Description mentions being extra wide for cases like Otterbox. But apparently they’re not as deep as a phone case that has a credit card holder on the back. Still looking for something with a larger front to back measurement.
I noticed when I put it on my dash and it's to hot outside it comes off. Sometimes when I am driving it comes off and it sucks. If it wasnt because of that  I would give it and 5 star.

The clip for the vent did not fit my VW so I attached the plate to the dash for the suction cup and works ok, just wish the arm was an inch longer so it can move side to side. It barley reach the front of my dashboard.
It’s okay not great not bad

Suction power was great but not good enough to stick to my dash.  I decided to use the adhesion pad.  The suction cup has stayed secured to the pad with the adhesion bottom.  The adhesion pad on the other had has not worked well and I am constantly having to fix it.

reviewTitle: Does not fit otter box, a thick case
reviewDescription: It was not deep enough to hold my Otterbox Pop case with enough security for my iPhone 13 Max. The first time it flew, it scared me and it was the last time I used the holder.

I opted to use the clip to attach to the vent. Holds the phone well…but once the phone is in the holder it no longer sits in place so that you can see the screen, the car mount shifts the phone facing down. It isn’t sturdy. Very disappointed
I really wanted to mount it to the top of my dash but it just will not stick. So I have to use the vent attachment instead.  The vent attachment does work very good.

I bought this for my husband after he got a ticket for holding his phone up to his ear while driving.  In our state you must drive hands free.  This was easy to install on the windshield & easy to get the phone in & out.  I know this bc if any part of that were difficult my husband would have thrown it out the window.

reviewTitle: Gets the job done, high quality
reviewDescription: We recently purchased an older car to use for commuting to and from work. It did not have any smart features so we are utilizing our phones for music, navigation, and communication. This device fit my Iphone and the wifes Samsung perfectly. It opens wide and would seem to fit any phone on the market. The grips ensure that your phone will not fall out and its easily opened with a touch of a button. The suction poster to the windshield is impressive and it has yet to become detached. It adjusts in and out to bring the phone nearer of further and also up and down. We did not utilize the dash mount feature but it comes with everything you would need to include instructions. Also, my wife and I both are able to charge the phones while they are mounted in the device. It seems to be high quality and again, the suction is impressive and doesnt leave any residue. Only time this comes off is when we are putting the sun shade in the window. To remove, its an easy lever pull to release suction and I pull the tab to remove. Good buy.

It’s a great holder and mount for my phone! It’s not a charging mount but that’s ok it holds my phone securely and keeps it snug in place. It’s also super easy to set up in the car and stays secure to my dashboard.
Melts off when it’s too hot. I hate the one on the vent because it gets so cold or so hot also. Mine just broke just under two years. So it did well. I’m just sad. I guess ntn last for ever

Update: Still working great after 8 months! Ordering another for our second vehicle.-----------I am only using the vent attachment, I haven't tried sticking the phone holder to the dash or the window because my dash is rounded and textured and it gets 120+ in my car in summer.This works so so well! Finally! I've tried so many and they never work. This holds the phone and keeps it exactly where I put it!With all the other holders we tried, my phones always fell or moved when we hit bumps. They broke easily or never functioned well.Not this one! It holds my phone so securely and my phone is very large with a huge otter box on it!I'll update if we have any problems, but we've been happy with it for weeks now!

Really great product and amazing customer service! The product melted initially in my car, which I was very frustrated with but representative May helped to resolve this issue immediately. She had a new version with updated heat resistant properties sent for free and I haven't had any issues since!
I would buy again,

reviewTitle: Rugged, Sturdy, Flexible and well priced.
reviewDescription: The design is sleek, very flexible with several adjustments. It is strong and ridged. Well priced and high quality.

I recently bought this one when my last phone holder broke. I typically use magnetic mounts; however, I have seen the Vicseed open on Amazon and liked that it had such good ratings.Unlike some of the reviews, I found installation to be very easy. I did not use the mount plate although it's recommended. I mounted my Vicseed by suction-cup mount only and directly to the dashboard. I cleaned the area first by wiping it down with rubbing alcohol and then applied the suction cup. I let the mount sit overnight before using it the next morning.I have had no problems such as  mount not adhering or falling off, and the temperature in my car during the day can get to be 100 or more degrees.The only thing that would make me like this mount better would be to have the arm come down lower and closer to the level of my air vents. Right now it's lowest position still sits rather high on my dash for my liking.It's easy to place my phone into as well as release my phone when I am done. It allows my phone to still nestle easily into the mount, even when the charging cord is attached. Although it still bounces a little when driving, I thinks it's expected as it is attached to the car.Overall, I am quite pleased with the Vicseed. However, should issues arise, I will update my feedback.

I ordered this for my SUV months ago. Every other phone holder I found would unattach and my phone would go flying. This attached smoothly to my dashboard, keeps my phone sturdy as I drive and is not too big. For reference, I have an Google pixel 7pro and my phone fits perfectly. Just ordered a second for my husband van to use on our road trip. Highly recommend

I have an iPhone 8+, it’s not a very big phone but I do have a ring pop socket (which also isn’t very big) but the sides don’t hold it super well. It’s fallen twice when I’ve taken slow turns but it’s not too bad. It’s only been a few days, I only go about 20 minutes to get to work and it’s done well. The holder itself is pretty sturdy, doesn’t lean forward like ones I’ve had in the past so that’s good.

I haven't mounted mine.  Currently, I just have mine attached to my vent.  It works pretty well, however it doesn't quite hold my phone in it all the way because I have a pop socket on the back of my phone, so just be aware.  Your phone may or may not fit if you have a pop socket on your phone.  But as I said, mine still holds my phone decent enough to use.

reviewTitle: Not for everyone, but it works.
reviewDescription: I got this because with my phone case and popsocket my phone ends up being a little on the thick side. I was hopeful this would hold it securely. It does hold it but barely. If I hit a speed bump the phone snaps out.I take my phone out of it's protective case when I use this now. It's a little inconvenient, but does it's job now without issues.
It didn't fit in my car. I'm sure this depends on your type of vehicle. I use this at work. It suctions to my desk and my phone is facing me at all times in case of a text. I love it.

Awesome holder, solid, great extension, but returning it for a couple reasons.1) I have a pixel 4a and the rear plate doesn't allow me to use the finger print reader.2) My wife has a case that holds her driver's license and a couple credit cards and this isn't deep enough to accommodate those.Overall great mount, just didn't meet my needs.

The suction is really good, but the little hand that holds it up is cheap as heck, if i hit a bump it loosens the lock and drops it down so i have to lock it up again. Only happened a few times but other than that its good

reviewTitle: Holds phone as promised could be more versatile
reviewDescription: I have an iphone max with a case. It was too large for my previous phone holder. This product securely held my phone in place. My only complaint is I can’t turn my phone to landscape or back to portrait without using two hands. This definitely holds the phone securely and stays adhered to the windshield in all temperatures.

reviewTitle: The clip was my saving grace
reviewDescription: If it wasn’t for the clip, this product would have been returned. The bottom disc did not stick to my dashboard at all. Thankfully the clip fits securely in my vent. I still want the option of using the dash but I don’t know how to get another adhesive.

The mount fell and stopped sticking the first day so I used the vent one and it literally broke while I was driving.Update: The seller was super helpful and sent me a new one for free. I’ve been using the vent one for a couple weeks now and so far so good! I haven’t had any problems with it so far. Big thank you to the seller for reaching out to me and solving the issue.

reviewTitle: Great price and does the job
reviewDescription: I bought this to use in the car.  Easy installation and nice adhesive.  It does stay in place ehen i hit bumps and holds my phone in place.  Easily adjusts to the phone.  Now when exposed in intense heat it has popped the holder off the dash but went back no issues.

I had been looking at various mounts for my phone for a while. I finally settled on this mount, and I can say that I am very pleased with this product. The mount is very well made, and it is very solid. The suction cup is very strong. The mount is easy to manipulate if you would like to change from portrait to landscape for MAP/GPS applications. The mount is also well padded at points where it contacts the phone, and the holders on the mount extend to a very wide with for larger phones. I like that the mount has a release button on the side to expand the mount clamps when you want to remove your phone.It is a great product. I would not hesitate to suggest this mount as a great option for your vehicle.

I had the original one for over a year, after being bounced around in a tractor trailer, it finally had enough. That was after driving 100k miles. They sent me a replacement quickly, and it's just as strong as the original one was.Absolutely the best phone mount out there especially for truck drivers that need something heavy duty.

I've had a few suction cup windshield cell phone holders and they suck. They lose suction after a few days. I've had this for a couple months and it works great. I have an iphone 13 with a small case and it holds it fine. Even in hot days, the suction stays. It comes with a vent attachment and a dash board mount but I didn't even try those. The suction against the windshield works fine.

reviewTitle: I love this cell phone holder
reviewDescription: I've been working with Uber and Lyft for about 3 months now.  it's amazing what Best Buy sell's you for $30.00 a fan clip that the ball joint doesn't work either because the phone is too heavy or just the plain heat.  Then I went to Walmart and again my phone is too heavyI finally decided to look on Amazon and under HEAVY DUTY.  I found this along with Great reviews.  This holder is great it actually has something to tighten the ball joint so my phone can be heled in the case.  For me the vent  clip didn't work because there is a piece of plastic above my air vent in the car for esthetics which blocks the vent holder being tightened. However the windshield holder works perfectly! my phone is stable and tight and it stays on in 180 degree disgusting heat in the car in Florida.I'm sure the dash would be great also but i'm afraid because even though it says it won't ruin the dash Florida is a constant 150 to 180 degrees in the car and I won't take any chance.I know I'm ranting let's get to the point.  This is a beautiful cell phone holder. I'm a man that only takes quality. it's heavy duty, it holds my ultra 23 with the case tight and I'm sure you will be happy with it.  Buy this don't waste your time in Walmart or Bestbuy they they will sell you a $30.00 piece of junk that doesn't work.  This VICSEED is the best holder i ever had and now i can work safely.  thank you I recommend this product.
Awesome phone holderl
It worked well and have no issues

reviewTitle: Great Product With Potential; Strong And Effective!
reviewDescription: I had an Excellent experience Chatting With Nora The Seller of the Product. She Gave me A second One to Fit My exact Expectations On the Correct Correspondence to My car. And also, who Knew you could Mount it On the Front Windshield with Tough Sticky Mounts with a disc Protection from Your Windshield From Damaging. I always Knew that I Would consider Purchasing this one because of its Unique Features and Extra Add-ons. It has two mounting options to choose between and set your mounting Port and clamp Your Phone Onto the Car Air Flaps on the Car or onto the Windshield Screen with the Screen Disc Provided for Extra support. I would Recommend this product to everyone that Needs an Upgrade for Mounting Your Phone instead of constantly Having to Hold your Phone which is dangerous while Driving! I’m a Multitasker; I can handle it but others.. No. But if you buy this your setting yourself up for Success and Convenience. It’s an essential Product especially if your business requires you to drive For Long Distances while still maintaining consistent Safety measures and assurance with this Product to help you keep both eyes on the road while enjoying yourself listening to audio podcasts, or Scrolling through your apps; without the distractions of Having to constantly Hold Your phone which in turn increases the risk of Injury because You can’t seem to look up; only down on your phone since your arm is so tired of holding your hand up. So if that applies to you than you should Buy This Product ASAP!! Also, Thank You Nora!!! Your Awesome; And Appreciate your Kindness/Services.~ Ali

This mout works great with either the suction cup, or the vent mount. I used mine for 3 years, then the adhesive lost its stickiness after I cleaned it with alcohol. I contacted customer service, and they sent me a replacement no charge! Lifetime warranty and Great Customer Service!
I like this cell phone holder because it is Easy to use , very sturdy and has a strong suction to the surface it is applied.
Works great right out of the box. No complaints. Caught it on sale.

reviewTitle: orks great on your desk too!
reviewDescription: Originally, I was going to put this in my "Big Girl" Jeep. After assembling it for the suction cup mode, I thought I'd try out the suction power on my mahogany desk with a satin finish. It sticks great! I'll probably just take it off the desk and put it in the Jeep when I'm driving someplace, which really isn't that often.It well-made and fully adjustable. There is an expandable arm that allows you to pull the phone out to about 8", or you can leave it back to about 4". The included a 3M adhesive plate if you want to use the suction cup on a rough surface. It's a 2-thumbs up from me!

Purchased November 6, 2021. Has just fallen off my window. This has been an excellent phone mount for me. I drive about four hours each day. It has been out in the sun in Florida and Georgia. Ordering another today!
This is awesome. It has 3 mounting modes. It accommodates my phone case and is very versatile. It rotates and slants to my viewing needs. I’m glad I found this product! I highly recommend this!

reviewTitle: Suction mount failed & melted, but company replaced it with a new one
reviewDescription: Review Updated 5/24/2022The company got in contact with me, it seems the previous person that was working with me in customer service has left the company, and thus my e-mail back had not been found for a while.  Once customer service got in touch with me, they sent me out a replacement, and sent me several notes to ensure everything was correct and offered to apply a lifetime warranty to the item if the same issues keep happening.  At the end of the day - if a company stands by a product like that, and is willing to go above and beyond to help, I can't really think of giving them less than 5 stars, so I am amending my review.Previous ReviewWhen first installed this mount seemed like it was going to work well.  Over time, the clear suction cup became yellow.  I e-mailed VICSEED that this did not look right and if they would replace it.  This was really an eyesore on the windshield, but they said this looked normal to them and if it had more of an issue in the future they would help out.A few months after this, I noticed it starting to melt, and so I went to take it off the windshield and it was a gooey mess as pictured.  I messaged them back for a replacement, as they said they would provide one when the suction cup started to fall, but they never responded to my follow-up e-mail.I can understand that things fail over time - but specifically they have the marketing claim that this "will leave no residue behind".  Per the pictures I have included, that does not seem true, and it was frustrating that they did not follow-up on the message to replace the unit.
Good buy
I have an eggshell finish on my dashboard and nothing sticks to it. But used the disc that came with this and I have no problem with it. Love it!
Phone holder is 5 stars. I like that it comes with the holder for the dash and a holder for the AC. It’s easy to install. Flexible. Lifetime warranty.
Bonito

The first was for my teenage daughter. I liked hers so much that I purchased one for myself and for my husband. Now I've just purchased a fourth for my older daughter. It's easy to install. You have the option of attaching it to your dashboard, your windshield or on an air vent. I chose the windshield and believe me, that suction cup is not going ANYWHERE. There's some serious adhesion here, so I would recommend being pretty sure about where you want it before you actually attach it!
Very easy to install and stable using the vent clip. It broke after a couple of months but they had fantastic customer service and I got it replaced for free very easily and quickly.

reviewTitle: Just glad it fits all phone sizes
reviewDescription: I was surprised to learn the disk for the dashboard needs 24-48 hours to be 100% adhered. Then you stick the suction cup to the impossible to remove disk, and it holds your phone. But, any time it gets hot in my car, which is basically every day, the section cup peels off and falls to the floor. I have to constantly re-suction it.

reviewTitle: Not for extra thick cases as advertised.
reviewDescription: While it seems like a good holder in general, it does not hold a phone with an extra thick case as it says it does. It’s actually worse than my old one. In need of a holder that can hold a case with the credit card holder on back. This is not it.

reviewTitle: Doeant fit popsocket phone with case
reviewDescription: Reviews state this will fit with a large case and or popsocket and this is not the case for my LG phone. My case is small and thin and I still had to take it off, as well as when it in the mount the wings of the mount push the buttons for "okay google" and it tries to pick up on my voice while I install it

I wanted to use the suction cup in my car but the suction would not release once attached. Also the adhesive did not stick to my dashboard. I was forced to use the vent option which was not what I wanted but the only choice left.

Worked great for 4 months. Easy to install and suction never failed. However, the ring that tightened the swivel broke after 4 months. I hadn't touched it, and now it just flops around. My only guess is that the cold weather made the plastic fragile.

The look of the phone mount was nice but, I didn't actually use it. The vent holder I already had 2 others similar so, I didn't open or use the VICSEED, the suction cup holder didn't fit where I wanted it to on my dash, I don't have a flat platform for it to fit. I also, use a wallet phone case and thought the holder was thick enough to use w/my ph still in the case but it wasn't .
I like the fact that the holder stays in the car.  I don't want to mess up my dash with the adhesive so will try the windshield, but since it's not flat, it may not work. So far the vent has held.

It doesn't stick well to my car and my phone often falls off while I'm driving. My boyfriend has a similar product but its magnetic so the phone stays in, I would recommend trying to find that over this product..
This mount gets the job done, but the adhesion is not the most reliable. It fell off numerous times, and I eventually had to replace it.

reviewTitle: Suction cup has poor sticking power
reviewDescription: If you're looking for something to mount temporarily (e.g, in a rental car), the suction cup mount isn't it.  It would consistently pull off of a well-cleaned glass or flat dash surface - the length of the arm plus an average-size phone was simply too much torque for it to handle.  The vent-clip worked fine, however, as did the phone-holder itself - thus the three stars, not 1.

So I followed the directions to a T. I waited 24 hrs before putting the actual phone holder on. And then I went above that and waited another 24 hrs for it to all settle before putting my phone in. The phone holder still popped off. In 2 days... now I have it on my windshield which is not where I wanted it but it's been holding since... it's been almost 3 weeks so that's a good sign. I just wanted it on my dashboard and not my windshield.

reviewTitle: This is a great cell phone holder
reviewDescription: Even tho it’s a great cell phone holder just doesn’t hold a thick phone case as it stated. I have a walli case which has a wallet and a loop. So nothing would hold the phone in its case. Works fantastic without my case on but that’s not the point of getting this holder. I need my phone to stay protected in its case. so I had to return it. I only installed the vent did not attempt the sticky mount

reviewTitle: Okay except won't stick to dash!
reviewDescription: I tried to put this mount on my dash and it kept falling off. Even used the circle to help but it wouldn't stick to my dash. I had to put it on my Windshield and it kind of blocks my view when I have my phone on it. Get another product if you want this to stick anywhere else besides your windshield.

reviewTitle: Doesn't stick to dashboards very well.
reviewDescription: The suction sticks to the adhesive pad just fine but trying to mount it in the car has required additional adhesives, even after making sure the dashboard was clean. It also didn't stick to the window very well at all.Amendment: The other components of this product work well enough, such as securely fastening to the air vents. Also, after leaving the review they offered me a full refund and did NOT require an amendment to their review, I am amending it just because the product is good quality just lacks in sufficient stickiness to windows and dashboards.

I was very excited to I install this. I followed their instructions, cleaned the area and stick the botton round plate on my dashboard and waited 24 hours. The next day, after 24 hours passed, I put my phone in, and began driving. I driving with my GPS on when suddenly the whole piece with my phone in, fell onto the passenger floor. I tried to glue it again but it didn't stick. I dismounted it and let it stand fir one day, but still didn't stick. I unglued the suction part from the rounded piece glued to my dashboard, and use the suction part directly in the dashboard. I didn't want to put in on my windshield glass. So far it has sticked in place. Very disappointed for the price

The vent clip isn't as secure as it should be, mostly cuz the teeth on the clip don't work great. A slight tap and it goes flying off. The hold onto the phone is great and secure but it is slightly inconvenient because you have to push a button on both side to loosen its grip from the phone. Which is normally fine but it then knocks off the vent. Will save for a better one. Until then it is ok

I drive a Mercedes GLA 250 and the only place to put this mount would have been the window. I didn't want it on the window due to obstructed view. I tried this mount everywhere the car would allow. This would be more of a car thing than the product but the rubber piece on the mount barely stuck to the window itself. I figured I would try the plate that helped it stick to your dash but that thing wouldn't stick ANYWHERE. I tried flat surfaces, rounded, smooth, etc. Nothing would stick.I also have a larger S20 Ultra from Samsung and the phone is just too heavy and too large for this device.  This wouldn't be an issue but the product says 'big phone' friendly but it just isn't. No matter how much I tightened the nuts the phone over time made the device sag.

reviewTitle: Not good in the Arizona 115° temperature.
reviewDescription: This company has to think about the environment that they are selling this product in or at. I am in Arizona and the adhesion sucked from day one. I cleaned off my dashboard from all debris, tried putting the sticky adhesive part on my dashboard,I thought it was staying on,, but it stayed in place for all of 1 minute. It slid right off of my dashboard and into my lap.So I had to use the vent clip, which isn't long enough to go over the vent slats.So I had to tighten the lug tight as I could get it, so that it wouldn't fall off and prayed that it wouldn't damage my vent slat in the process.

I am unsure if my Samsung S21 with Otterbox Defender case fits nicely in this mount. There is always a feeling that it might fall. I tried to attach this phone holder to my garmin car dashboard beanbag mount and it fits. While it gives a good grip it is too small. I think Vicseed should do some R&D to create a mount for something similar to garmin dashboard beanbag. That is ideal for larger phone with otterbox case.
Works well but, alas, the sticky pad has become unsticky. Wish it had a regular suction cup.
Good price
I used it today In my work truck. It holds firmly and attached securely and easily to my dash. So far we'll pleased.

reviewTitle: Great product but can't get it off of my dash
reviewDescription: I bought this 2 years ago (2022) and am now donating my car and would like to take this with me.  BUT, I can't get it off of my dash. :-(  I THINK I am trying to remove it correctly, but that sucker is STUCK on my dash and NOT letting go! Oh well.

reviewTitle: I am so happy with this purchase!
reviewDescription: I did a little research before buying.  This phone holder is perfect.  Easy to install, sturdy.Excellent product!

reviewTitle: Very good product and thanks for quality service.
reviewDescription: Arrived on time, good product and quality service.  Thanks and will buy again in the future.
I’m using it for my vent so I can’t comment on how well it works sticking to your dash but it works pretty good in the vent!
If you want just a simple phone holder for your car this is perfect.  I use the vent clip and it works great and is easy to use.

reviewTitle: The device is of very high quality. I'm very satisfied
reviewDescription: The device is of very high quality. I'm very satisfied

I have never had a car mount for my phone. I originally was going to use the suction but after playing with it I Decided to use the air vent holder. Gives good angle does not block the air study and doesn’t wobble!
Perfect, exactly what I needed 👏

reviewTitle: UPDATE TO THIS REVIEW  NOT DURABLE -- Third one in a row that broke
reviewDescription: And in my frustration with this item, I posted a review last week. I am happy to report that the seller responded immediately and professionally. Seller is in the process of resolving the issue and as soon as I get replacement parts, I will report back further. At the moment, I will keep trying this item, and hope that the replacement part resolves all issues. Thank you to the seller for being so incredibly responsive.

When I first purchased I thought my issues of having faulty car mounts were officially gone. Especially since this one had such great reviews and was a little pricier than some I passed up on. My five below mounts that I would buy would eventually break or fall off but they never melted to my windshield or dashboard. I’ve never moved it unless it fell which was very rare. Then all of a sudden when i’d get in my car it would be off my windshield. Spending over 30minutes getting this adhesive off my windshield and dashboard wasn’t fun either. It was good while it lasted!

I didn't understand why I needed a thick gel adhesive since my last mount was just suction which worked great on my windshield, but I installed it as instructed anyway. It held great and worked just as I needed it to - for about a year. Then, one summer day I came out to see the whole thing just hanging from my windshield by a big, long stretch of goop. It was hard to get the holder off as the goop was stuck to both it and the windshield, very thick, and still sticky. I later spent quite a bit of time removing the thick adhesive from both surfaces and tried using just the suction cup without adhesive. It feels firm at first, but won't hold my phone for more than a minute seconds before falling. So, here I am shopping for a phone mount again.

reviewTitle: Did not stay on the dash
reviewDescription: I watched the video and believed it would work and it didn’t. Did not stay on my dash past 30 days. It does not stick

reviewTitle: Adhesive on suction cup very weak
reviewDescription: As per the instructions on the package, I placed the suction mount down and waited 24h. I then placed the suction arm onto the mount and waited 15 min. Within 15 minutes the suction cup and my phone fell off the mount. Very disappointed

reviewTitle: Car Phone Mount NOT Thick Case Friendly
reviewDescription: I bought this mount because I have a wallet style cover for my cell phone.  I found this mount to be smaller than the one I currently have.  It was not suitable for a wallet style cover.Updated 9/3/2020 - VICSEED provided great customer service.  They sent me a free updated model to see if it worked.  It didn't work but even the other two car phone mounts that I thought might work did not work either.  Manufacturers need to use longer side arms to hold phones with thicker covers.  I finally put 2 small squares of velcro tape inside the cover between the back of the phone and the inside of the leather cover.  It holds the phone in place and when I put it in the VICSEED holder, I turned the magnet tab backward to secure the other side of the phone/cover.  It works!!!

For the price I love that it brings both suction cup and clip for the vent.. Clip is great has a good hold to the phone but the suction cup didn't stick at all seems we have to both something to help it stick..

reviewTitle: I did not enjoy this product
reviewDescription: This was not a good purchase. When I took it out of the box it looked like a nice sturdy phone holder for my car. It comes with a piece of it attaches to the dash or window and a piece that attaches to the air vent. I really wanted to use the suction on my dashboard. It would not stick to any clean surface in my car. It's also very long and you have to be careful where you put it so you it won't be in the way when you try to drive. So I attempted to try it in my air vent but they're no fault of this item, it would not fit in my air vent. I found this product to be very frustrating and ended up giving it away to someone that could possibly use it.

I bought this because it advertises thick cases and being fully adjustable. It does allow for many different positions, which is great! But it doesn’t work with thick cases! I didn’t see the tiny print that says it won’t work with pop sockets. I have a super think case and thin pop socket and it’s waaaaay too thick! My old phone has a finger strap with nearly flat holders and that doesn’t fit either. My daughter has the loop thing and that definitely doesn’t fit.Also, my iPhone 12 mini is too short to be able to record while driving. Which is one of the main things I wanted it for.

The only part of this that is worth anything, is the vent mount. The main reason I bought this was to get my S22 ultra off the vent... but the construction of the arm that holds the device is too weak to hold up to the weight of the phone. Recommend not buying this. The tighteners are plastic aswell as the arm. Needs metal to be able to support bigger phones. I'm sure it works great on lighter phones, but if you over tighten and fastener it's never gets tight again.(and it's easy to over tighten). Threw away the arm mount, kept the vent mount.

reviewTitle: Doesn't stay secure when the sun comes out
reviewDescription: Bought this in January.  Worked well for the first 8 weeks or so while it was cold outside.  When the sun started heating up as spring came along, it kept falling off the dash board.  I followed all the instructions on reattaching it, and it keeps falling off.  Really surprised.  Unable to contact seller/company either.  Went to their store front, and could not find any way to get product support.

Don't buy this because I had it on my windshield for three weeks and when the first day the outside temperature reached 72 degrees it just fell off. I can't find out how to contact the seller to see if they could send me a new adhesive replacement. I was driving so please be careful it could cause you to have an accident.I ended up buying the 3M rubber adhesives so it would stop falling off. Update

This product does not work. I followed the directions exactly, even the extra instructions they sent in an email after I received the phone mount. Perhaps my phone was too heavy? I even tried to place the arms of the mount so the weight of the phone would not be hanging at an angle that would put pressure on the base. Bottom line is that the base wouldn't even hold the mount by itself overnight in my garage.

I have a galaxy S8+ with a protective cover, not as thick as the otterbox.  My phone doesnt fit.  You have to unscrew the back of the holder to adjust the width then tighten back down.  Very awkward for constant removal and replacement of phone when getting in and out of vehicle.  That alone disqualifies this phone holder, imo, unless you're going to leave your phone in the car.  But, it doesnt fit my phone at all.  Returning

Purchased 10 of these for my company vehicles and 5 months later, most are broken. The screw cuff is the oroblem. You need to loosen it to adjust it and then tighten it to hold the phone secure.... But, the screw cuff peice breaks easily and renders the item useless since it no longer will hold the phone in the correct position.  Hoping for replacemwnt parts refund or replacement.

I attempted to use this product in my vehicle, and was unsuccessful as the adhesive did not work, and neither did the suction power. Next time, I will seek advice/feedback from friends/family who have purchased a car phone mount that actually works. This just goes to show that you absolutely get what you pay for. Everything that is offered as a discount is not always a good deal!

This SUCKS!!! I Bought this item because I wanted a phone mount I could mount to my dash. I thought I got a good one but no. I cleaned the dash before. To make sure there was no dust or anything on it. I put the pad on and then I mounted the phone mount. And I was driving with it for less than five minutes and the POS falls off while I’m driving. WTF man!!! Don’t waste your money go look somewhere else.

reviewTitle: Please, replacement was defective as well , no pin holding long connection arm missing
reviewDescription: Went to install and no way as arm not connected , missing a pin so 1st damaged and returned this replacement in pieces, i just wamt to return this 2nd broken and please refund my money , i am having no luck. I give up. Please refund , i will return , this is in pieces with no connecting pins.

reviewTitle: Can’t use with a pop socket
reviewDescription: Bought this because it said it would work for bigger phones, so I assumed a pop socket would be ok. It is not deep enough to grasp a phone with a pop socket firmly in place. My phone kept falling off while I was driving. This could be easily solved by extending the feet and making the side grips a little larger. The suction and function is good. Just please make it useable for phones with pop sockets- most people have them now!

I was happy with the product when it first arrived. Then the sun and heat started. I had the suction cup attached to the window in my truck and the suction started to melt. The phone holder started to slide down the window. Once I was able to scrape the suction off my window it took awhile to get all the goop off.I do not recommend this product.
The glue that's supposed to stick the circle to the dash of my car does not stick.

reviewTitle: This item does not work as advertised, does NOT stick to dashboard!
reviewDescription: Adhesive does not stick to dashboard when it becomes too warm, which is most of the year on sunny days.Unfortunately, I have missed the window to return. Very disappointing, Amazon. Defects do not always present themselves within 30 days.
Doesn't adjust automatically. Too much trouble securing it in place everytime you put it in, and having to do extra steps when taking it out.

Bought 3 of these for our 3 vehicles. Design and functionality are amazing. Really good, solid product in that regard. We didn't want to stick them to the window since we use sunshades in the summer and the vent clips didn't really work all that great. We decided to stick them on the dashboard.However, none of them stuck to our dashboards for more than a day. All 3 vehicles have different style dashboards and it stuck to none of them. My dashboard is a smooth surface with no design, bumps, leather, etc... just a smooth surface. Mine stuck to the dash the longest, at just about 24 hours after allowing the allotted time to let the material stick to the dash. On my second time using it, the holder detached and fell on the floor. Tried to re-stick it but it kept falling. The base is very sticky and I was very surprised it didn't work. I'm actually glad this happened during the winter because I'm sure the summer heat would have loosened the seal, and the product would have failed then... out of the return period. We returned all 3.

reviewTitle: Gonna need to buy a different one soon...
reviewDescription: From installation to function, this was a pain. The suction and adhesion isn't that great to the car surface (yes I cleaned and put it on a flat surface and waited the specified time before hooking up the phone holder and the phone). It unstuck. The part that actually attaches the phone got stuck because I couldn't unscrew it with my hands. Had to use a hammer to get enough torque to undo it. Have been using the vent attachment ever since. It was fine until it wasn't. It keeps tilting (my phone isn't that big or heavy, most phones are actually bigger than mine) and the attachment keeps slipping off of the vents. It looks like an little piece broke. Just an all around headache.
will not stick and cleary had been returned.

reviewTitle: No suction and no adhesion power at all. so no installation either. Waste of money!!
reviewDescription: No suction and no adhesion power at all. so no installation either. Waste of money!!The product arrived after I left for my home country. After returning I tried to install but its not having any adhesion or suction. The moment I am putting phone to holder, The holder falls forward due to weight. Not good for smart phones. Mine is I-Phone 13. Please don't waste money. This product is useless.Seller said money will be refunded. I submitted yesterday a feedback that money is refunded depending on that email from seller but not it’s not refunded yet!! And still i dont see any refund information in my amazon account.

It has 3 options, suction to dash, glue to dash,or vent clip.This thing is too heavy for suction, not using glue on my Mercedes and of course it won't attach to vent but for vent, again too heavy.Unless you wanna glue this thing to your expensive cars, don't get it.
Adhesive doesn’t stick to the dash despite following the directions exactly. Unless you want to use super glue to stick it in place, don’t waste your time.

reviewTitle: Melted down my windshield in less than six months!
reviewDescription: It melted down my windshield leaving a clear sticky mess that gets on everything it touches. It is advertised as good for thick cases but my otterbox defender case is barely held. It is awkward like its not meant to be and your forcing it. I have a thin finger ring glued on the back of my otterbox defender case which is about the same thickness as a pop socket and it barely grabs the sides of my case and it is hard for me to get it to grip it when setting it up for use. It really needs another quarter of an inch of gripping sides to hold it confidently. Another issue is that I have it suctioned to my glass and in two weeks it fell off once...which isn't awful but still it isn not great either. I have it basically resting on right above the dash in case if falls off and it still pulled away from the windshield.

reviewTitle: Don’t hesitate this is the one!
reviewDescription: Im not really a phone holder type guy, however this is definitly one of the better ones I’ve ever used. It has so many different options on how to adjust angle how far out you want it, easy release button, The back is shaped like.a phone so is nice feeling carrying around or typing on, I rarely leave feedback for products. This one 10/10!
A very durable product.

I’ve used other car mounts in the past but this is by far the best one I’ve ever tried. It sticks almost too well. I’ve never had a problem with it and they last a long time; I had my previous one for 2 years. I just bought a new one because they upgraded it to help with sun exposure. I have an IPhone Max so it’s important that it withstands the weight. This is the ONLY car mount I trust and use - I got my whole family one for Christmas.

reviewTitle: Very good holder for my iPhone pro max
reviewDescription: This is a very sturdy unit, easy to mount in various places in my car, and the best part is getting the phone in and out of it. It’s very simple no Hasley no struggling with my prior holder. I have a Nissan pathfinder is very well suited for that And I have bought two, another for my wife’s Lexus 200 and it works great there too. Recommended!
Have been using this for about a month now with the air vent clip and am happy. Doesn’t budge, doesn’t drop my phone, was super easy to install.
Great Product.

reviewTitle: Versatile. Easy to Install. Works as Expected.
reviewDescription: Note: This review is based on the vent-mount, rather than the suction-arm mount. My phone is an LGV30, with the huge, heavy, Love Mei case, which is .6" thick (a tenth of an inch thicker than this device recommends).So far, so good. It mounted quickly and easily, even with my giant, heavy phone case. It barely fit the width of my phone, and had to be slowly wiggled into place. However, this is probably because my phone case is a tenth of an inch thicker than their maximum allowance, so it meets the adjustable grips at a place where they're more narrow. I'll give them some slack on that.The device comes with two mounting options (suction mounted arm, or vent mount), which fits many scenarios. It keeps my phone securely in place, and allows me to position it exactly how I want it, for easy viewing. I haven't been using it long enough to see how durable it is under rough driving conditions, but will update if there are any problems.The specifications for this device say it handles phones that are "4-7" inches wide. I'm not sure what they mean by that. It will definitely handle a phone that is 7" long, but the adjustable jaws only go 4" wide. I suspect what they meant is that it will handle a phone that's up to 4" wide and 7" long.Another note here, regarding one two-star review, where they said this device wasn't for thick phones. That person's phone had a pop-socket mount glued to the back of it. You can't use this with a pop-socket mount, and it's not fair to judge this device based on such ignorance. Also, the specifications for this state your phone is supposed to be less than or equal to .5" thick, and with their pop-socket mount, their phone was closer to an inch thick.
Perfect fit and steady!

reviewTitle: The best vent mount I’ve had to date
reviewDescription: This is by far the best mount I’ve had to date.  It stays where you put it, has a very strong magnet so the phone stays put. I’ve bought several more for other cars I drive.

I normally use when I rent a vehicle. Easy to mount. Excellent stability. Easy to get phone in and out. The adhesion is excellent too. When in remove it, I reuse the original non-stick covering to keep the stickyness until the next time I use it. Been using for a year now and still is great!
Has performed flawlessly. Even moved to a second vehicle and it's lasted without a single issue. Highly satisfied. Easy to use.

This phone mount is so good! The last one I had was always falling and a bit flimsy. I've had this for maybe 6 months now and it hasn't fallen once. The way it's set up doesn't allow for it to fall. I can adjust its position and lock it into place and it will stay. However, keep in mind that it is meant to keep in one spot, so when you install it, make sure it's where you want it to be for a while. My phone fits perfectly in it. It was very easy to install and it's made perfectly to charge your phone while set in the phone mount.
Sturdy and does the job

reviewTitle: 2 months in - perfect in my Mazda with suction
reviewDescription: Stuck it on the dash two months ago, and it's done great.
Fits nicely
Easily and securely holds my phone.  Easy to remove my phone from the holder.
I like this and will buy otheres for my other car

Bought this a few days ago and WOW. It is durable, locks in tight to vent and rotates! Haven’t used the mount for the dash yet but I’m sure it is just as stable! The release and locking function also works great!

This a fabulous, well made, cell phone holder!!  I will absolutely buy more for my other vehicles!!  ****** Instructions ****** You must though my degrease the spot your going to attach it to.  A little alcohol swab isn’t going to cut it.  I used an un-scented alcohol sanitizer on a paper towel and scrubbed it!  Once the area was completely dried I placed the adhesive disc and pressed down hard.  The instructions say to let things rest for a day.  I erred on the side of caution and left it for a day and a half.  Here is the catch!!  You have to mount the suction lever towards the windshield.  If you mount it any other way it will fall off!  I’ve tried to sow this in my 2d photo.  The end result is a very stable mount that survived a brutally hot North Carolina summer.  I spent hours researching different makes and models of cell phone mounts until I found this one.  I read through the comments and incorporated the different lessons learned into the process I used.  I wish you the success I had!

reviewTitle: Great phone holder for your car that won't fail!
reviewDescription: I have had many phone holders for my car but none ever lasted and felt flimsy, this holder when installed on my dash is solid! My phone locks in place and does not move, even on the roughest roads! So glad I bought this holder and highly recommend it! I use a Samsung 24+!

I purchased an ac vent holder but it would not work on my vents. Returned it and bought this one. Attached to the top of my dash and all the adjustments allowed my phone to be in a perfect visible position and it's convenient to have the charging cord on the phone while in this holder. It's been on the dash 2 weeks and hasn't budged. Highly recommended. It has so many adjustments.
I love it, it’s the best one I’ve bought. All the others break so easily, highly recommend.
Really happy with bitten. I’ve only used the air vent part of it and I love it!
Great

I have tried many phone mounts over the years. Vent mount, dash mount, cup holder mount. They all are good at some things and poor at others. Maybe it’s sturdy but it blocks a vent. Or it has good visibility but it’s a little wobbly. Very sturdy, doesn’t block anything, but it’s out of your peripheral vision, making it dangerous.This mount is literally the only thing that I’ve ever used that has checked every single box.Most important to me, it’s extremely stable. You can extend the arm quite a bit and maneuver the angle to suit your needs, and I was shocked at how little jiggle there is. I’ve actually bought two of these mounts and the original is still stuck to the glass where I installed it two years ago. That’s impressive.And the fact that you can stick it to any glass means you’ve got a lot of choices on where to mount it. I’ve got mine off to the left in the small triangle window of the driver side door. This puts my phone just off to the side, perfect to keep my eyes on the road and check the map.It comes with a vent mount as well but I’ve never used it. The glass mount is all I have needed. And I really like the spring loaded mounting mechanism which allows you to gently nest your phone in the holder and release it when done.Zero complaints for me. Especially at this price. I would probably pay double, given how durable it is. Knowing I won’t have to buy another mount is priceless. The only reason I bought two, is because I got another car.I’m a fan.
Applied to windshield. Does all that it is supposed to do.

reviewTitle: I liked the options-vent or stick on
reviewDescription: Works great in my car. Happy with my purchase
Borrowed one from a friend and had to replace it.  Decided to get same model.  Sturdy and stable it’s a great mount.  Wouldn’t use any other.
this was easy to install and easy to use, however won't work well with a thick phone case
You got it right. I wish the depth of the brackets was bigger for thick cases and pop sockets.

reviewTitle: If you live in a very hot climate - 2 THUMBS DOWN
reviewDescription: This does NOT work in  hot Texas summers. I like the idea of the holder, but it just doesn't work. If you always park your car in a garage, then yes, maybe it would be ok.  I gave up after the holder, with my phone in it, fumbled off the dashboard during normal driving. It just can't handle the heat.

Great product in lots of ways huge CON falls off!!!I started with the mounting plate - cleaned and dried area, attached mount to flat surface, apply pressure for 2-3min, allowed to sit for 24 hrs.I was driving down the interstate and phone falls straight to the floor.So I went with the suction to glass option, lasted about two weeks, driving across bridge this morning and down goes the phone to the floor of the car.And guess what??? Just pass the allowed days to return! Another piece in the garbage.I wish Amazon had a way for us to flag companies we no longer wanted to purchase from

I really like the design of this and how it holds my phone and the level of adjustment, however it falls off my windshield multiple times a day making it useless..  I've cleaned the windshield, cleaned the suction cup, and tried to optimize the way I have it on the windshield to make it have as little downward weight and force as possible, and it still falls off my windshield several times a day.  I replaced it with a $8 suction style holder from Walmart with zero issues, the Vicseed just doesn't have enough suction power.  Great cell phone holder aside from the fact that it can't do the thing it's designed to do...

reviewTitle: “Stable as a rock” and “powerful suction” my ass
reviewDescription: I followed the directions to a T for installing this car mount and literally with 3 seconds the whole thing fell off when I placed my phone on it. The suction part of this car mount won’t hold up the weight of my phone. Don’t waste your money!

Mount keeps falling off of it rendering the entire product useless. False advertising as it is not sturdy at all and can’t hold the weight of itself. Very dissatisfied as I got this for my fiancé for our anniversary and it didn’t work out.

I bought this in February and by April it wouldn’t stick no longer. Used this on my dash and even set it to where the bottom of my phone was supported and didn’t put too much pull or weight on the sticky part. It was a failure and a waste of money. I would not recommend.

reviewTitle: AVOID UNLESS YOU WANT DASH BOARD DAMAGED
reviewDescription: What you’re seeing in my picture is the top dash board surface that adhered to the sticky mount. Now I have a light circle in the area this was mounted on my dash board. It peeled the top layer of my dash board right off. This product was only stuck on my car for a few weeks. I decided to take it off and I’m glad I did…otherwise the surface of my dash board might’ve ripped off when I removed it from my BRAND NEW HONDA CRV. Disgusted with this horrible product. You’d be wise to avoid it!

I bought this based on reviews.  I like the construction of it and how it adjusts several ways.  It stuck to windshield great, until I put my phone in it.  It stayed on less than 5 minutes then fell off the windshield.  Not extreme temperatures at the time.  Returned it. Starting my search again.  I have an IPhone XR with a small case on it.**edit*** my husband turned the suction cup part upside down and it now has stayed adhered for 2 days with my phone on it.  See photo.

I tried using it with the vent clip prior to using adhesive suction. Neither worked at all.  Phone kept dropping where I could not see screen. Then I used the adhesive suction that was in box. Well I mounted it for a couple of days to ensure it was good, only to come out after a warm day to find the adhesive didn't stick well. It came off the dashboard. I would not recommend at all. Of course it always happens when it is too late to return. I wish I would have not waited to test it out after receiving shipment.

Will start with shipping, was a prime product, 2nd shipping, it took 6 days to arrive.  I purchased this due not wanting to put adhesive pad in my jeep, didn't happen.  Adhesive is terrible, it stuck to nothing, the holder kept falling off window and area of dash I wanted it to go.  Owned it for about 5 minutes before I returned it.  Don't wast you money, it would be better to throw the money out of the window instead of wasting it on this piece of junk.

reviewTitle: Piece of crap with no customer support
reviewDescription: Adhesion came off within 3 months of use.  It stuck to the dashboard just beyond the Amazon "return" window, so it's a complete waste of money.  I tried contacting the company through the Amazon provided website, but it's just a series of links in another language that go nowhere.  Definitely don't buy this product unless you want to waste your time and money.  I'd give it a zero star rating if I could.
The thing wiggles around so much… When I put my phone angled so I can see the screen it flops all over the place and I can’t find a solution for it…

I put the mount on my dashboard and let it sit for a few days because the instructions said the longer it sits the better the suction. Well that is not true. When I put my phone on the holder as soon as I start driving the suction comes off and the whole mount with the phone falls off. The one that screws on the air vent works fine.
Very disappointed, it did stick on dash board even 1 day or 5 sec so am using it other way by clipping it to the vent it’s working great over there otherwise it’s dashboard attachment is fail :(

I purchased this phone holder for my car. I tried sticking it to the dash board it is not staying the adhesive does not stay the entire holder falls off the base. I tried the clip for the vent in my car my phone keep falling off. I’m not happy with this purchase. I tried using double sided tape to connect the holder to the base it is still not sticking. I own a IPhone 12 plus.

reviewTitle: Will not buy another!  Damaged the dashboard!
reviewDescription: The boast of high temp was untrue.  The suction cup melted a sticky slimy mess down the dashboard.  Removed Vicseed phone mount and threw it into the trash.  Then paid an upholstery shop almost $40 to remove the sticky slimy mess leaving a mis tinted color to the dash. Mick

The nut that held the cradle onto the arm cracked within a month making this phone mount unusable. I imagine most people would have tossed it after that. I replaced with a brass plumbing nut that I got at the hardware.  I had to modify the nut by cutting off the collar. I also attached a post to keep the phone mount steady.

I used it yesterday and it held during the night but it does not hold during the day and kept falling off which is very dangerous while driving. I will be sending this back. So i decided to try again followed the instructions and it still does not hold suction but now i cannot remove the adhesive circle that is on my dash. So i can return it. What should i do?
It did not even last 2 months. A component in the inside broke and released a spring. Total waste of my money. I had high hopes when it was brought.
I didn't like the structure and how it held my phone.  It was quite bulky.

Bought this item early spring. Had to stick mount directly on my dash as the included adhesive plate would not stay securely.However, it has stayed put over months of regular use. Your dash might get damaged, but it will definitely stay put.

reviewTitle: Easy to install and use but adhesion pad could be better
reviewDescription: We installed the pad for the mount suction cup on the car dashboard and waited the recommended time before mounting a phone. After a long drive with an iPhone 12 mounted at max arm length, the adhesive pad fell off. Luckily it was still sticky and stuck on with a shorter arm length.Other than that, installation is simple and the phone is easy to mount and take off.

I have tried other phone mounts and none really work as well. I had to replace my phone case so my weather tech didn't work anymore. Magnetic mounts don't work either. My phone is kinda large and thick thanks to my poetic case on my Samsung galaxy s21 plus. It still barely fits, but better than others. I can now have it on my windshield where I can see it.
Kept falling down whenever the car sat in the sun... ended up getting something else.

reviewTitle: Used the Vent Mount, Love it.
reviewDescription: ok, so I've had this thing for 24 hours, so not exactly a long term test...  HOWEVER, I can tell you that I love the vent mount. Easy to attach, and mounts with no wiggle or give.  So far, no real negatives.  I'll update if anything comes to mind.  Can't speak for the window mount, personal preference, I don't like 'em.  Looks sturdy enough.

I got this to use in my wife's car while I'm DoorDash delivery driving. She did not want anything permanently mounted in her car, so I got this model because it had the vent clip option. It works . . . okay. The part holding the phone works just fine. The part holding onto the air vent is just okay. At its maximum tightness, it will still slip right off the vent if I rotate the mount to the left or pull on it in the slightest. You really need to keep it stationary, which is fine. I mean, for the money, it's good enough for someone not looking for a permanent setup.

Alot better than my last phone mount, it was the kind that clips on the vents. Only problem is this one wiggles back and forth like the suction cup is loosely fitted to the base, so the whole mount bounces/moves back and forth. Other than that it's been great these last few weeks. Also I suggest setting the direction of the base of the mount like in mine and others photos, it gives you a couple extra inches so your phone isn't resting right against the vents, depending on your car.

reviewTitle: Happy I made the switch from vent clip to this holder!!!
reviewDescription: Was very excited for this to arrive I’ve gone through so many cell phone holders and I have finally given up with the vent clip and gone to the suction and this one with the extending arm works just perfectly with my wireless attachment. Very happy hopefully it sticks for a long time the suction is great but the adhesive doesn’t really adhere to my dashboard as much as I’d like but I can fix that that’s not a big deal my biggest concern was whether it would coordinate with my wireless charger and it does and I am very happy with it

reviewTitle: Great but weight of phone causes tilt
reviewDescription: I liked everything about this except for the fact that the piece that your phone actually sits on tilts from the weight of your phone. It’s a problem I’ve had with every phone mount, but this one at least mounts to the dashboard so it doesn’t completely fall over. I do wish there were a way to tighten the ball and socket joint considering the fact that cheaper ones have that ability, but it’s something I can look past for it’s overall great quality.

The product is fine. I have had no problems with how it works. Though keep in mind if your dash is slightly curved, it will not stick to the dash. I had to stick mine to the window. I didn't want to cover up the ac, cause it's super hot during the summer.However, the rubber backing is just not holding up to the Texas heat. It has bubbled up and I hope the backing doesn't come off. I'll update if it does.Overall, it's solid and I believe you get a good product for what you pay for.

reviewTitle: Melted and made a huge mess
reviewDescription: It melted and made a huge mess. If you live somewhere where it gets above 80 degrees Fahrenheit don't buy it. It was good otherwise.

When you first use the product, it's great. The suction is strong and it holds. But after a few weeks, the suction starts to lose its effectiveness like all the other suction phone mount products. It keeps falling down.  I do, however, like the ease of set-up of this product.

Overall, this has a very great suction and does not get worried if there's excessive heat on your window like I have been used to with other brands. However I'm quite disgruntled about this one because this is the second time I ordered this particular one and the clamps are different than the first one therefore my phone doesn't set steady with the side clamps because they curve in the ones I had before actually were straight and not curved if that makes sense I will not be buying this again because of that. The whole idea is to hold your phone and if you have a contraction that can't do that then there's no purpose.

The suction cup with the glue is great for the windshield. I had it there for a while with no problems...except putting in a sunvisor was impossible because of the huge arm sticking out of the glass. In the Vegas heat a visor is a must have. So, I decided to use the air vent option but the part that comes together to hold/pinch the vent was way too long and hits on the inside components and wouldn't go in all the way (2020 4runner). So it would keep falling off with the weight of the phone. Lastly I tried the disc with "3m" like glue on the dash but that also didn't work and kept unglueing with the weight of the arm and phone. Returning.
